name: Play it again Sam 14
overview: A compilation of 4 games: Ballistix a 1 or 2 player ball puzzle game. It was developed by Peter Scott and was originally released in 1989 by Superior/Acornsoft. Predator a single player scrolling shooter. It was developed by Peter Scott and was originally released in 1989 by Superior/Acornsoft. Star Port a single player arcade adventure game with between-level puzzle elements. It was developed by Tony Oakden and was first published in this compilation. Superior Soccer a 1 or 2 player football game. It was developed by Peter Scott and was originally released in 1989 by Superior/Acornsoft.
